categories.title: Exploration

categories.title: Mining and Production
categories.description: Uniglobal Industrial Trading Inc. has the exact tools and equipment you need for your mining operations. Our products are made from the highest quality to increase production and efficiency.

headerDesc: Uniglobal Industrial Trading is a multi-national trading company that provides world-class quality drilling tools and equipment for mining, exploration and construction industry.

sections.title: What our clients say about us

services.title: Quality
services.description: We care for our clients' satisfaction—we provide maximum utility of our resources, from manpower to warehouse facilities, all the while following a rigorous quality control process by monitoring product specifications with accuracy from loading to shipment.

services.title: Commitment
services.description: With over 10 years of solid reputation to uphold, we act as our clients' extension of operations through timely, organized delivery of products and services that go beyond requirement.

services.title: Value
services.description: We take pride in continuously providing the best deals for our clients and shareholders, earning us the credibility as supplier and distributor of choice within the global construction, mining, and exploration industry.
